attr.title: The Flayed Man
attr.desc: You are the Flayed Man. Awaking in a decayed, otherworldly house where your every waking moment is agony, you must uncover the sins of the past, pass judgement, and decide your fate in this unsettling, macabre adventure.
attr.inst: Purchase the game on itch.io (https://snoringdoggames.itch.io/the-flayed-man) or Steam (https://store.steampowered.com/app/3471670/The_Flayed_Man). Copy the 'The Flayed Man.ags' file to the 'theflayedman/gamedata' folder.
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game on [itch.io](https://snoringdoggames.itch.io/the-flayed-man) or [Steam](https://store.steampowered.com/app/3471670/The_Flayed_Man). Copy the `The Flayed Man.ags` file to the `theflayedman/gamedata` folder.
